name: wid3_F2F2_module12
label: F2F 2: health (CASI)
description: This questionnaire module contains questions on: alcohol consumption; attractiveness self-evaluation, evaluation of the other twin; beginning of physical and psychological changes, evaluation of changes; current subjective health; diagnoses (adults and children); doctor's visit; heigth, weight, bmi; impairment caused by diseases; information on pregnancy and in-vitro-fertilization of the twin pregnancy; information on twins' children; medication; occurence of externalising problem behavior (e.g. being restless and easily distracted, having tantrums, lying and cheating); occurence of internalising problem behavior (e.g. headaches and nausea, nervousness, and being easily scared); patience; personality measures (BIG5); preventive medical checkup; risk aversion; sexual attraction to males and females, sexual labeling, sexual behavior; smoking.

she0100.question: she0100
she0100.name: she0100
she0100.label: How would you describe your state of health during the past 12 months, in general?

items.text: How would you describe your state of health during the past 12 months, in general?
items.text_de: [IF age >= 10 and age <= 15] Wie wuerdest Du Deine Gesundheit in den letzten 12 Monaten im Allgemeinen beschreiben? [IF age >= 16] Wie wuerden Sie Ihren Gesundheitszustand in den letzten 12 Monaten im Allgemeinen beschreiben?
items.description: Source: Ellert, U., Lampert, T., & Ravens-Sieberer U. (2005). Messung der gesundheitsbezogenen Lebensqualitaet mit dem SF-8. Eine Normstichprobe fuer Deutschland. Bundesgesundheitsblatt - Gesundheitsforschung - Gesundheitsschutz, 48 (12), 1330-1337
items.description_de: Source: Ellert, U., Lampert, T., & Ravens-Sieberer U. (2005). Messung der gesundheitsbezogenen Lebensqualitaet mit dem SF-8. Eine Normstichprobe fuer Deutschland. Bundesgesundheitsblatt - Gesundheitsforschung - Gesundheitsschutz, 48 (12), 1330-1337

doc0100.question: doc0100
doc0100.name: doc0100
doc0100.label: Have you visited a doctor (or dentist) in the last 12 months? (This includes check-ups, visits to psychotherapists, health practitioners, chiropractors, etc.)

items.text: Have you visited a doctor (or dentist) in the last 12 months? (This includes check-ups, visits to psychotherapists, health practitioners, chiropractors, etc.)
items.text_de: Haben Sie in den letzten 12 Monaten Aerzte (inkl. Zahnarzt) aufgesucht? Hiermit sind auch Vorsorgeuntersuchungen gemeint, sowie Besuche bei Psychotherapeuten, Heilpraktikern, Chiropraktikern o.ae.

doc0101.question: doc0101
doc0101.name: doc0101
doc0101.label: Please indicate how often this happened. Here we mean total frequency in the last 12 months. If you are not sure, please give the approximate number number of times.

items.text: Please indicate how often this happened. Here we mean total frequency in the last 12 months. If you are not sure, please give the approximate number number of times.
items.text_de: Geben Sie bitte an, wie haeufig das war. Damit ist die Haeufigkeit insgesamt in den letzten 12 Monaten gemeint. Wenn Sie es nicht genau wissen, geben Sie bitte die ungefaehre Anzahl an.

hbe0400.question: hbe0400
hbe0400.name: hbe0400
hbe0400.label: In the following we would like to know what you do to care for your health. To what extent does this statement apply to you personally: I take active steps to stay healthy (e.g., go to regular checkups, follow a healthy diet, and avoid unhealthy behavior, etc.).

items.text_de: Im Folgenden moechten wir erfahren, inwieweit Sie fuer Ihre Gesundheit vorsorgen. Inwieweit trifft folgende Aussage auf Sie persoenlich zu? Ich sorge fuer die Erhaltung meiner Gesundheit aktiv vor (z.B. durch regelmaessige Vorsorgeuntersuchungen, gesunde Ernaehrung, Vermeidung von gesundheitsschaedlichem Verhalten, etc.).

items.text_de: [IF age >= 16] Bitte geben Sie Ihre Koerpergroesse an. Wenn Sie es nicht genau wissen, koennen Sie sich gerne jetzt messen, ansonsten schaetzen Sie bitte. [IF age >= 10 and age <16] Bitte gib an, wie gross Du bist. Wenn Du es nicht genau weisst, kannst Du Dich gerne jetzt messen, ansonsten schaetze deine Groesse bitte.

pub0100.question: pub0100
pub0100.name: pub0100
pub0100.label: [IF sex = 2] In puberty you get hair under your armpits and in the pubic area. For girls, the breasts begin to grow and they get their period (menstrual bleeding). Have you noticed whether any of these changes have already started for you? [IF sex = 1] In puberty you get hair under your armpits and in the pubic area. For boys, facial hair starts to grow and the voice changes. Have you noticed whether any of these changes have already started for you?

items.text: [IF sex = 2] In puberty you get hair under your armpits and in the pubic area. For girls, the breasts begin to grow and they get their period (menstrual bleeding). Have you noticed whether any of these changes have already started for you? [IF sex = 1] In puberty you get hair under your armpits and in the pubic area. For boys, facial hair starts to grow and the voice changes. Have you noticed whether any of these changes have already started for you?
items.text_de: [IF sex = 2] In der Pubertaet bekommt man Haare unter den Achseln und im Schambereich, bei Frauen beginnt das Wachstum der Brueste und sie bekommen ihre Tage (Monatsblutung). Haben bei Dir einige dieser Veraenderungen schon begonnen? [IF sex = 1] In der Pubertaet bekommt man Haare unter den Achseln und im Schambereich, bei Maennern beginnt das Wachsen der Barthaare und sie kommen in den Stimmbruch. Haben bei dir einige dieser Veraenderungen schon begonnen?
items.description: Source: Adapted from: Watzlawik, M. (2009). Die Erfassung des Pubertaetsstatus anhand der Pubertal Development Scale. Diagnostica, 55(1), 55-65. Additional Items delevoped for TwinLife.
items.description_de: Source:

answers.label: 3: has definitely started
answers.label_de: 3: hat auf jeden Fall schon angefangen

answers.label: 4: I already have the body of an adult woman/an adult man
answers.label_de: 4: alles ist schon wie bei einer erwachsenen Frau/einem erwachsenen Mann

pub0300.label: These physical changes are often accompanied by changes in how you think and feel, for example, new interests develop and mood swings can occur. Have you noticed changes like this in yourself?

items.text: These physical changes are often accompanied by changes in how you think and feel, for example, new interests develop and mood swings can occur. Have you noticed changes like this in yourself?
items.text_de: Mir diesen koerperlichen Veraenderungen gehen haeufig auch Veraenderungen im Denken und Fuehlen einher, zum Beispiel entwickeln sich neue Interessen und Stimmungsschwankungen koennen auftreten. Hast Du solche Veraenderungen bei Dir schon bemerkt?
items.description: Source: Adapted from: Watzlawik, M. (2009). Die Erfassung des Pubertaetsstatus anhand der Pubertal Development Scale. Diagnostica, 55(1), 55-65. Additional Items delevoped for TwinLife.

seo0100.question: seo0100
seo0100.name: seo0100
seo0100.label: In the following, we would like to ask you some questions that concern your sexuality. Do you consent to this? The questions are very personal, but please rest assured that your answers will be treated strictly confidentially and separated from your name. If you do not want to answer the questions, this will have no effect on our further questioning.

items.text: In the following, we would like to ask you some questions that concern your sexuality. Do you consent to this? The questions are very personal, but please rest assured that your answers will be treated strictly confidentially and separated from your name. If you do not want to answer the questions, this will have no effect on our further questioning.
items.text_de: Im Folgenden wuerden wir Ihnen gerne einige Fragen stellen, die Ihre Sexualitaet betreffen. Sind Sie damit einverstanden? Die Fragen sind sehr persoenlich, aber bitte denken Sie daran, dass Ihre Antworten streng vertraulich behandelt und unabhaengig von Ihrem Namen gespeichert werden. Falls Sie die Fragen nicht beantworten moechten, hat dies keine Auswirkung auf die weitere Befragung.

items.text: To what extent do the following statements apply to you?
items.text_de: [ITEMBAT] [IF age >= 10 AND age <= 15] Wie gut treffen folgende Aussagen auf Dich zu? [IF age >= 16] Wie gut treffen folgende Aussagen auf Sie zu?
items.description: Source: Adapted from: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130
items.description_de: Source: Adaptiert von: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130

items.text: I often have headaches, stomach aches or feelings of sickness.
items.text_de: [IF age >= 10 AND age <= 15] Ich habe haeufig Kopfschmerzen oder Bauchschmerzen; mir wird oft schlecht. [IF age >= 16] Ich habe haeufig Kopfschmerzen, Magenschmerzen oder Uebelkeit.
items.description: Source: Adapted from: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130
items.description_de: Source: Adaptiert von: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130

items.description: Source: Adapted from: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130
items.description_de: Source: Adaptiert von: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130

items.text: I am often unhappy, down-hearted or tearful.
items.text_de: Ich bin oft ungluecklich oder niedergeschlagen; ich muss haeufig weinen.
items.description: Source: Adapted from: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130
items.description_de: Source: Adaptiert von: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130

items.text: I am nervous in new situations. I easily lose confidence.
items.text_de: Neue Situationen machen mich nervoes; ich verliere leicht das Selbstvertrauen.
items.description: Source: Adapted from: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130
items.description_de: Source: Adaptiert von: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130

items.text: I have many fears, I am easily scared.
items.text_de: Ich habe viele Aengste; ich fuerchte mich leicht.
items.description: Source: Adapted from: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130
items.description_de: Source: Adaptiert von: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130

items.text: I am usually on my own. I generally play alone or keep to myself.
items.text_de: Ich bin meistens fuer mich alleine; ich beschaeftige mich lieber mit mir selbst.
items.description: Source: Adapted from: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130
items.description_de: Source: Adaptiert von: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130

items.text: I have one good friend or more.
items.text_de: Ich habe einen oder mehrere gute Freunde oder Freundinnen.
items.description: Source: Adapted from: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130
items.description_de: Source: Adaptiert von: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130

items.text: In general I am popular with others.
items.text_de: [If age < 18] Im Allgemeinen bin ich bei Gleichaltrigen beliebt. [If age >= 18] Im Allgemeinen bin ich bei anderen beliebt.
items.description: Source: Adapted from: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130
items.description_de: Source: Adaptiert von: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130

items.text: [If age < 18] Other children or young people pick on me or bully me. (Age 10 - 17)
items.text_de: [If age < 18] Ich werde von anderen gehaenselt oder schikaniert.
items.description: Source: Adapted from: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130
items.description_de: Source: Adaptiert von: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130

items.text: [If age < 18] I get along better with adults than with peers.
items.text_de: [If age < 18] Ich komme besser mit Erwachsenen aus als mit Gleichaltrigen.
items.description: Source: Adapted from: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130
items.description_de: Source: Adaptiert von: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130

items.text: [If age >= 18] I am very reserved; I work out things by myself.
items.text_de: [If age >= 18] Ich bin verschlossen; mache Dinge mit mir aus.
items.description: Source: Adapted from: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130
items.description_de: Source: Adaptiert von: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130

items.text: [If age >= 18] Others don't take me seriously or even bully me.
items.text_de: [If age >= 18] Ich werde von anderen nicht ernst genommen, oder sogar gemobbt.
items.description: Source: Adapted from: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130
items.description_de: Source: Adaptiert von: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130

items.text: To what extent do the following statements apply to you?
items.text_de: [IF age >= 10 AND age <= 15] [NCS] Wie gut treffen folgende Aussagen auf Dich zu? [IF age >= 16] [NCS] Wie gut treffen folgende Aussagen auf Sie zu?
items.description: Source: Adapted from: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130
items.description_de: Source: Adaptiert von: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130

items.text: I am restless, I cannot stay still for long
items.text_de: Ich bin oft unruhig; ich kann nicht lange stillsitzen.
items.description: Source: Adapted from: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130
items.description_de: Source: Adaptiert von: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130

items.text: I am constantly fidgeting or squirming
items.text_de: Ich bin dauernd in Bewegung und zappelig.
items.description: Source: Adapted from: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130
items.description_de: Source: Adaptiert von: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130

items.text: I am easily distracted, I find it difficult to concentrate
items.text_de: Ich lasse mich leicht ablenken; ich finde es schwer, mich zu konzentrieren.
items.description: Source: Adapted from: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130
items.description_de: Source: Adaptiert von: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130

items.text: I think before I do things
items.text_de: Ich denke nach, bevor ich handele.
items.description: Source: Adapted from: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130
items.description_de: Source: Adaptiert von: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130

items.text: I finish the work I'm doing. My attention is good
items.text_de: Was ich angefangen habe, mache ich zu Ende; ich kann mich lange genug konzentrieren.
items.description: Source: Adapted from: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130
items.description_de: Source: Adaptiert von: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130

items.text: I get very angry and often lose my temper
items.text_de: Ich werde leicht wuetend; ich verliere oft meine Beherrschung.
items.description: Source: Adapted from: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130
items.description_de: Source: Adaptiert von: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130

items.text: I usually do as I am told
items.text_de: Normalerweise tue ich, was man mir sagt.
items.description: Source: Adapted from: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130
items.description_de: Source: Adaptiert von: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130

items.text: I fight a lot. I can make other people do what I want
items.text_de: Ich schlage mich haeufig; ich kann Andere zwingen zu tun, was ich will.
items.description: Source: Adapted from: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130
items.description_de: Source: Adaptiert von: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130

items.text: I am often accused of lying or cheating
items.text_de: [age < 18] Andere behaupten oft, dass ich luege oder mogele. [age >=18] Andere behaupten oft, dass ich nicht die Wahrheit sage.
items.description: Source: Adapted from: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130
items.description_de: Source: Adaptiert von: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130

items.text: I take things that do not belong to me.
items.text_de: [age < 18] Ich nehme Dinge, die mir nicht gehoeren (von zu Hause, in der Schule oder anderswo). [age >=18] Ich nehme Dinge, die mir nicht gehoeren.
items.description: Source: Adapted from: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130
items.description_de: Source: Adaptiert von: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130
